code: import React from'react';import AOS from'aos';import'aos/dist/aos.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const skills=[{name:'HTML/CSS',percentage:90},{name:'JavaScript',percentage:85},{name:'Python',percentage:80},{name:'Java',percentage:75},{name:'C++',percentage:70},{name:'Problem Solving',percentage:85}];const Skills=()=>{React.useEffect(()=>{AOS.init({offset:0});},[]);const scrollToTop=()=>{window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:'smooth'});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"skills",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills-container","data-aos":"fade-up","data-aos-duration":"1500",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"My Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-grid",children:skills.map((skill,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-item","data-aos":"fade-up","data-aos-delay":100*(index+1),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-name",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:skill.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"skill-percentage",children:[skill.percentage,"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skill-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skill-progress",style:{'--progress':`${skill.percentage}%`}})})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"back-btn-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"back-btn",onClick:scrollToTop,children:"Back to Top"})})]})});};export default Skills;
